edge: Captain Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell is played by Tom Cruise in the movie.
Lieutenant Bradley 'Rooster' Bradshaw is played by Miles Teller in the movie.
Penelope 'Penny' Benjamin is played by Jennifer Connelly in the movie.
Vice Admiral Beau 'Cyclone' Simpson is played by Jon Hamm in the movie.
LT Jake 'Hangman' Seresin is played by Glen Powell in the movie.
Rear Admiral Chester 'Hammer' Cain is played by Ed Harris in the movie.
Admiral Tom 'Iceman' Kazansky is played by Val Kilmer in the movie.
LT Robert 'Bob' Floyd is played by Lewis Pullman in the movie.
Rear Admiral Solomon 'Warlock' Bates is played by Charles Parnell in the movie.

node_2: chief warrant officer four bernie 'hondo' coleman
edge: Chief Warrant Officer Four Bernie 'Hondo' Coleman is played by Bashir Salahuddin in the movie.
Monica Barbaro plays LT Natasha 'Phoenix' Trace, an F/A-18F pilot and mission candidate.
Jay Ellis plays LT Reuben 'Payback' Fitch, an F/A-18F pilot and mission candidate.
Danny Ramirez plays LT Mickey 'Fanboy' Garcia, Payback's F/A-18F WSO and mission candidate.
Greg Tarzan Davis plays LT Javy 'Coyote' Machado, an F/A-18E pilot and mission candidate.
Manny Jacinto plays LT Billy 'Fritz' Avalone, an F/A-18E pilot and mission candidate.
Raymond Lee plays LT Logan 'Yale' Lee, an F/A-18F pilot and mission candidate.
Jake Picking plays LT Brigham 'Harvard' Lennox, Yale's F/A-18F WSO and mission candidate.
Jack Schumacher plays LT Neil 'Omaha' Vikander, an F/A-18F pilot and mission candidate.
Kara Wang plays LT Callie 'Halo' Bassett, Omaha's F/A-18F WSO and mission candidate.
Lyliana Wray plays Penny's daughter, Amelia Benjamin.
Jean Louisa Kelly reprises her role as Iceman's wife from the original Top Gun, Sarah Kazansky.
Chido Nwokocha plays the role of Mission Controller in Top Gun: Maverick.
Chelsea Harris appears as the Admiral's Aide in Top Gun: Maverick.
James J. Brolin reprises his role as Admiral Tom 'Maverick' Bradford from the original Top Gun.
Tom Cruise reprises his iconic role as Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell in Top Gun: Maverick.
